Package io.micronaut.http.server.exceptions

Interface ExceptionHandler<T extends Throwable,R>

Type Parameters:
T - The throwable
R - The result type
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferLengthExceededHandler, ContentLengthExceededHandler, ConversionErrorHandler, DuplicateRouteHandler, ErrorExceptionHandler, ErrorResponseProcessorExceptionHandler, HttpStatusHandler, JacksonExceptionHandler, JsonExceptionHandler, NotAllowedExceptionHandler, UnsatisfiedArgumentHandler, UnsatisfiedRouteHandler, URISyntaxHandler
public interface ExceptionHandler<T extends Throwable,R>
A generic hook for handling exceptions that occurs during the execution of an HTTP request.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher

    R
    handle(HttpRequest request, T exception)
    Handles an exception and returns the result.
